original_text: He saith among the trumpets, Ha, ha; and he smelleth the battle afar off, the thunder of the captains, and the shouting.
korean_text: 나팔 소리가 날 때마다 힝힝 울며 멀리서 싸움 냄새를 맡고 지휘관들의 호령과 외치는 소리를 듣느니라

sentences.original_text: He saith among the trumpets, Ha, ha;
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 나팔 소리 중에 말하네, 하하,

sentences.original_text: and he smelleth the battle afar off,
